nodes.text: The Gree were a tentacled alien species after whom Clone Commander Gree named himself. Like the Aing-Tii, they exhibited neural activity that greatly resembled the motion and reactions of the plasma within ancient wayfinders.

The Gree were first mentioned in "The Gree Enclave", an article written by Timothy S. O'Brien that was published in the Star Wars Legends magazine Star Wars Adventure Journal 8 on November 1st, 1995. The species was confirmed to be canon by Star Wars: Absolutely Everything You Need to Know, a reference book written by Adam Bray, Kerrie Dougherty, Cole Horton, and Michael Kogge that was released on September 4th, 2015.
